full_text: RT @notgrubles: KYC is short for "divulging your holdings and personal information to any and all criminals who take interest in the inevit…

localize.full_text: RT@非诚勿扰。KYC是 "泄露你的财产和个人信息给所有的犯罪分子 "的简写，他们会对你的行为感兴趣... ...
localize.retweeted_status_full_text: KYC是 "将你的持股和个人信息泄露给任何和所有感兴趣的犯罪分子，信息存储的数据库不可避免地泄露 "的简称。

localize.full_text: RT@非誠勿擾。KYC是 "泄露你的財產和個人信息給所有的犯罪分子 "的簡寫，他們會對你的行爲感興趣... ...
localize.retweeted_status_full_text: KYC是 "將你的持股和個人信息泄露給任何和所有感興趣的犯罪分子，信息存儲的數據庫不可避免地泄露 "的簡稱。

retweeted_status.full_text: KYC is short for "divulging your holdings and personal information to any and all criminals who take interest in the inevitable leak of the database that information is stored in".
